meanings.definition: The state or quality of being friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: In the schoolyard, their mateships were evident as they played together every day.
meanings.sent2: Their mateships grew stronger as they shared secrets and supported each other.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, their mateships shone through as they roasted marshmallows together.
meanings.sent4: Their mateships were like sturdy bridges, connecting them through thick and thin.
